property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Elusive; BACK: Elusive; Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any abilities that deal fire damage, and any [Fire] allies. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.); BACK: Sextuple Wield (Can have up to six hands of Melee weapons and strike with any number of them during the same combat.); Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests and any Melee weapons. You can t include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: You can have any number of Pets.; BACK: You can have any number of Pets.; Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any Traitor cards, and any Demon allies. You can't include cards with reputation or other text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Flip Xia Gain control of target ally. Use only on your turn.; BACK: Deckbuilding: You can include only neutral quests, any abilities, and any Warlock allies with ally type Warlock. You can't include cards with reputation or text restrictions (like Fire Hero Required).

property.value: Each of your other equipment if untargetable while you have five or more equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate], Remove the top card of your deck from the game > If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, you may play it this turn if able. If it's a quest card, you may place it this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with a weapon, your hero heals all damage from target ally in your party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Hands of Fate enters play with three +1 DEF counters if an opponent went first this game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has +1 health for each ability and equipment you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Activate] > Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each of your armor with Mana-Etched in its name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Naaru Belt of Precision has +X DEF, where X is your hero's ATK.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has dual shield. (Can have a second Shield instead of a Melee weapon.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with a weapon, target ally in your party has long-range this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X, Destroy Band of the Inevitable > Destroy each equipment with cost X or less. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aldor Reputation; Your hero has Inspire: Ability, ally, equipment, hero, or resource.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aldor Reputation; Heroes and allies in your party with inspire are also protectors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation; Heroes and allies in your party with sabotage also have stealth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation; Your hero has Sabotage: Ability or equipment.; When your hero sabotages a card, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Loyal Hero Required (Can't put this in your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Untargetable

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thrown (When you strike with this weapon, your hero has long-range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero attacks, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.; Damage that would be dealt with Hammer of the Naaru is unpreventable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If your hero would deal damage to a Demon, it deals double that much instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lucky Strike Axe enters play with three +1 ATK counters if an opponent went first this game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Loyal Hero Required; Text that refers to the start of a turn refers to the end of that turn instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game > You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Tirisfal Wand of Ascendancy this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aldor Reputation; When Vindicator's Brand is destroyed, you may destroy target ability or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation; When Retainer's Blade is destroyed, you may destroy target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aldor Reputation; If you have another Aldor card in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scryer Reputation; If you have another Scryer card in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control an ability, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Loyal Hero Required (Can't put this into your deck if your hero is a Traitor.); Pay 1 for each card in your hand to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have an equipment, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 or more to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card for each 3 paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put both into hand. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove three equipment cards in your graveyard from the game to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If your hero has more damage than an opposing hero, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

card.name: I Was a Lot of Things

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card for each opposing hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Turn all quests face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opposing ally is destroyed, put a corpse counter on Minions of the Shadow Council.; Remove all corpse counters and pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: If you removed three or more counters this way, draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If no opposing allies are in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put target quest card from your graveyard into hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's deck. Put one on top of his deck and the rest on the bottom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Put a Bird ally token named Skywing with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, it has +3 ATK / +3 health and is an Arakkoa.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an ability was destroyed this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an ally is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untargetable; Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a Demon is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card.
